title: beacon-chain stopped with panic error
body:
Beacon chain stopped with panic error in version v1.0.0-alpha.24. 

**Logs:** 
Sep 02 02:11:46 eth2medalla prysm.sh[2727]: time="2020-09-02 02:11:46" level=info msg="Peer connected" activePeers=54 direction=Outbound multiAddr="/ip4/68.7.209.75/tcp/9000/p2p/16Uiu2HAm3oMUoVqMG8eA8EGXcdDgY1rqgTFTkp3YpHbnh1118py8" prefix=p2p
Sep 02 02:11:48 eth2medalla prysm.sh[2727]: time="2020-09-02 02:11:48" level=info msg="Processing block 0x7c8de804... 203072/203158 - estimated time remaining 7m10s" blocksPerSecond=0.2 peers=53 prefix=initial-sync
Sep 02 02:11:48 eth2medalla prysm.sh[2727]: panic: runtime error: index out of range [18446744073709551615] with length 64830
Sep 02 02:11:48 eth2medalla prysm.sh[2727]: goroutine 207 [running]:
